questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A bird flying and a wooden structure in background
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bird
C) A building
D) A person

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A bird
C) A tree
D) A bench

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A city skyline
B) The ocean
C) Trees and a building
D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bird
B) A car
C) A person
D) A flower

What type of bird is in the photo?
A) A sparrow
B) A crow or raven
C) A seagull
D) A parrot

What kind of building is in the background?
A) A skyscraper
B) A wooden structure
C) A glass building
D) A brick house

A) Cloudy
B) Clear and blue
C) Rainy
D) Stormy

What type of trees are in the background?
A) Palm trees
B) Pine trees
C) Oak trees
D) Maple trees

A) Perching
B) Flying
C) Eating
D) Nesting

B) Red
C) Black
D) Blue

What type of roof does the building have?
A) Flat roof
B) Sloped roof
C) Dome roof
D) Thatched roof

A) Wings closed
B) Wings partially open
C) Wings fully open
D) Wings tucked

What is the lighting condition in the photo?
A) Bright daylight
B) Overcast
C) Dusk
D) Dawn

What is the primary color of the building in the background?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Brown
D) Blue

What is the texture of the roof in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Shiny
D) Matte

D) Short and curved

C) Partially leafed
D) Flowering

B) The bird’s wings
C) The clouds
D) The roof tiles

B) Flying near the roof
C) Standing on the ground

A) Towards the camera
B) Away from the camera

D) To the right

B) Wood
C) Metal
D) Stone

A) Side view
B) Front view
C) Back view
D) Top view

B) Partially leafless
C) Completely leafless

B) From below
C) Eye level

B) Fluffy
C) Shiny
D) Matte

What is the lighting direction in the photo?

B) From behind

D) From above

B) Small

D) Large
